text: usase vah paak saaph aur baratar hai aur sab log to (pahale) ek hee ummat the aur (ai rasool) agar tumhaare paravaradigaar kee taraph se ek baat (qayaamat ka vaayada) pahale na ho chukee hotee jisamen ye log ekhtilaaph kar rahe hain usaka phaisala unake daramiyaan (kab na kab) kar diya gaya hota
